definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Make up and tighten the bolts diagonally when the X-tree is installed.
sentences.chinese: 安裝採油樹是要對角上緊螺栓。

sentences.english: This technique has broad application prospects in tertiary oil recovery.
sentences.chinese: 在三次採油中，該項技術有廣闊的應用前景。

sentences.english: This system has been applied successfully in an oil production station in Liaohe Oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 該系統已在遼河油田某採油站成功應用。

sentences.english: The tertiary recovery is an important means of the enhanced oil recovery.
sentences.chinese: 三次採油是提高採收率的一個重要手段。

sentences.english: The samples of polymer flooding oil-extraction wastewater were examined.
sentences.chinese: 對聚合物驅採油廢水的水質特徵進行了分析。

sentences.english: This article reviews the chief techniques of EOR by steam injection with ancillary additives.
sentences.chinese: 本文綜述了國外添加化學劑注蒸汽採油的主要技術。

sentences.english: This made the application of polymer flooding in steam-assisted recovery practical.
sentences.chinese: 這爲聚合物驅在蒸汽熱採油藏中應用提供了現實條件。

sentences.english: We must find economical methods for extracting oil from shale.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須找到從頁岩中採油的經濟方法。

sentences.english: QC Group of Green Operation, Shengli Oil Production Plant, Shengli Oilfield Sub-Company.
sentences.chinese: 勝利油田分公司勝利採油廠綠色作業QC小組。

sentences.english: The application of the jet flow and gas float techniques in water treatment of oil producting by polymer flooding.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了射流氣浮技術在聚驅採油水處理中的應用情況。

sentences.english: In 2009, the oil major's offshore production was 47.66 million tons.
sentences.chinese: 2009年，該採油巨頭的產量爲4766萬噸。

sentences.english: In Saertu Reservoir of Honggang Oilfield, oil production was started in 1974, it was at high water cut stage.
sentences.chinese: 紅崗採油廠薩爾圖油藏目前已進入特高含水期。

sentences.english: Based on DSP and IPM, a mid-frequency power source for heating oil well was designed, of energy-saving type.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種油井採油中頻感應節能加熱電源。

sentences.english: Third step is to make a conclusion of the new process that is reengineered.
sentences.chinese: 第三步，電子重組後，形成新的採油工藝設計業務。

sentences.english: Technics of oil production with ESP in high gas oil ratio oil well is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了潛油電泵應用於高油氣比油井的採油工藝技術。

sentences.english: At the same time, the application of system for Enhanced Oil Recovery was studied for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 同時，首次發現了本體系在三次採油中的重要作用。
